privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is very important to us. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your personal data.

dataCollection.title: What data we collect
dataCollection.content: We collect data that you directly enter into the app: notes (text, audio, images, video), account information (email, name), and app settings. We also collect basic usage data to improve the app.

dataUsage.title: How we use your data
dataUsage.content: Your data is used exclusively to provide app services: storing and organizing your notes, AI content analysis, syncing between devices, and personalizing your experience. We never sell your data to third parties.

aiProcessing.title: AI processing
aiProcessing.content: When you use AI features (transcription, summary, tags), your content is sent to OpenAI services for processing. These services do not store your data after processing. All AI requests are encrypted and secure.

dataStorage.title: Data storage
dataStorage.content: Your notes are stored securely on your device and in our cloud system (if you're a premium user). All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use industry standards for data security.

yourRights.title: Your rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time. You can export all your data from the app. To delete your account and all data, contact our support.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.content: We use: Clerk (authentication), OpenAI (AI features), RevenueCat (subscriptions), and Expo (push notifications). These services have their own privacy policies and process data accordingly.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, contact us at denis.djordjevic@gmail.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using the AInote app, you agree to the following terms of service. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the AInote app, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not use the app.

account.title: User Account
account.content: To use AInote, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

license.title: License to Use
license.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the AInote app for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include the right to resell or commercial use.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain all ownership rights to content you create in the app. You grant us a limited license to process your content to provide app services, including AI features.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: You may not use the app for illegal purposes, upload malware, violate other users' rights, spam, or any activity that may harm the app's functionality.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.content: Premium subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your App Store or Google Play account settings. Refunds are subject to store policy.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the app at any time, without prior notice, for violation of these terms or any reason at our discretion.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The app is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free or constantly available. We are not responsible for data loss.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. By continuing to use the app after changes, you accept the new terms. We will notify you of significant changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For legal matters, contact us at denis.djordjevic@gmail.com
